overview: Tension builds in this all male office block. Something in the sleek lines, dusty original brickwork and tight trousers that is pushing these men to the edge of distraction. At the centre focus of many very un-corporate sexy acts is the office junior, a cute new foreign intern who's turning heads, pressing crotches to desks and stirring the loins of these hot blooded men. They can't resist his alluring full lips and tight buns. Innocent he may look but he's the most insatiable of them all.
title: OriFFICE Junior
